local_intent: Ensure t_block is visible and localized, perform ApproachAndAlign with small tolerance, set yaw to 180 for leftward push, and verify orientation.
assumptions: Yaw 180 corresponds to the intended leftward push direction
t_block becomes detectable after a line scan if initially not visible
coherence_with_global: Matches global flow: perceive t_block, refine approach/alignment, set yaw to 180 and verify before contact and push.
